explanation.num_tested_probands: Number of probands tested: two unrelated Iranian families.
explanation.num_positive_het_probands: Number of positive HET probands: In the second family, we found a compound heterozygous genotype of the mitochondrial tryptophanyl-tRNA synthetase (WARS2) gene, comprising a nonsense mutation (c.325delA, p.Ser109Alafs*15) and a missense mutation (c.37T>G, p.Trp13Gly).
explanation.positive_phenotypes: Positive proband phenotype(s): moderate ID, microcephaly, ataxia, speech impairment, and aggressive behavior
explanation.num_compound_or_double_hets: Number of compound/double heterozygotes: In the second family, we found a compound heterozygous genotype of the mitochondrial tryptophanyl-tRNA synthetase (WARS2) gene, comprising a nonsense mutation (c.325delA, p.Ser109Alafs*15) and a missense mutation (c.37T>G, p.Trp13Gly).
